title: Former Emmerdale stars Chelsea Halfpenny and James Baxter are in a relationship
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Chelsea Halfpenny has shared that she is loved-up with fellow Emmerdale actor James Baxter.

The pair - who have both now left the ITV soap - have confirmed their relationship on Instagram .

Looking every inch the smitten couple, Chelsea's most recent upload, of them both, shows her nestled up to James as they beam in the selfie, which was taken on the beach in Whitstable.

The blonde, who is best known for her role as Amy Wyatt in the soap, first shared an image of James, who played Jake Doland in the Yorkshire based series, online October 2018.

She wrote next to the picture: "Perfection in a photo. @baxter3890."

(Image: chelseahalfpenny/Instagram)

Another cute image of the pair shows them snuggled up together during a getaway to Vienna, with Chelsea penning: "Pick a boyfriend that pretty much just looks exactly the same as you. @baxter3890."

Proving their romance is supported by their fans, the comments below their couple snaps are littered with kind words and messages.

(Image: chelseahalfpenny/Instagram)

One follower wrote: "Lovely photo and don’t you two scrub up well ha ha xxx"

Another gushed: "Aw! Gorgeous photo of you both."

"Stop it now, this is adorable" and "CUTE" wrote others.

(Image: chelseahalfpenny/Instagram)

Chelsea left Emmerdale in 2013 after being in the show for three years.

Her character was replaced by Natalie Ann Jameson earlier this year.

She has recently bagged a role in The 9 to 5 Musical in the West End and her previous credits include Casualty and Byker Grove.

James played Jake Doland in Emmerdale for two years and left in 2009 and his credits include Still Open All Hours and Red Dwarf.

description: The soap stars, who have both appeared in Emmerdale, have been dating for around a year
